publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5333 Mike Rumbles: Aboyne Maternity Unit—That the Parliament welcomes the decision by the Minister for Health and Community Care to reject proposals from NHS Grampian to close rural maternity units at Aboyne, Fraserburgh and Banff; congratulates members of the Save Aboyne Maternity (SAM) campaign and other campaigners on the positive way that they have resisted NHS Grampian’s proposals, and calls on NHS Grampian to work with local people to develop alternative options for birth units at Aboyne, Fraserburgh and Banff.
S2M-5333 Aboyne Maternity Unit (lodged on 15 December 2006) Carolyn Leckie*, John Swinburne*, Stewart Stevenson*, Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Margaret Smith*, Shona Robison*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-5333 Aboyne Maternity Unit (lodged on 15 December 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Dr Jean Turner*, Shiona Baird*

S2M-5333 Mike Rumbles: Aboyne Maternity Unit—That the Parliament welcomes the decision by the Minister for Health and Community Care to reject proposals from NHS Grampian to close rural maternity units at Aboyne, Fraserburgh and Banff; congratulates members of the Save Aboyne Maternity (SAM) campaign and other campaigners on the positive way that they have resisted NHS Grampian’s proposals, and calls on NHS Grampian to work with local people to develop alternative options for birth units at Aboyne, Fraserburgh and Banff. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie, John Swinburne, Stewart Stevenson, Rob Gibson, Brian Adam, Margaret Smith, Shona Robison, Donald Gorrie, Mrs Nanette Milne, Dr Jean Turner, Shiona Baird
